cs.IR, cs.LG, cs.CL, cs.CV, cs.DS 

Reasoning: The paper deals with the problem of learning to rank in information retrieval, which is a core topic in the field of information retrieval (cs.IR). The proposed algorithm is based on the perceptron algorithm, which is a classic algorithm in machine learning (cs.LG). The paper also discusses the use of performance measures such as NDCG and AP, which are commonly used in information retrieval and machine learning (cs.CL). The proposed algorithm involves large margin ranking surrogates, which are related to the concept of margin in machine learning (cs.CV). Finally, the paper discusses the theoretical analysis of the proposed algorithm, which involves concepts such as convergence and lower bounds, which are related to the field of theoretical computer science (cs.DS).
